tool.name: enrichCustomerPortfolio
tool.displayname: Enrich Customer Portfolio with FFIEC Data

param.name: customerLayer
param.dialogReference: The input ArcGIS point layer representing the portfolio you wish to enrich. This input MUST be a point layer. If your customers are not yet geocoded, you will need to geocode your customer table first.

param.name: tractsLayer
param.dialogReference: The input tracts layer containing the fields you wish to join. Use the Build FFIEC Feature Class tool to create this layer, and then use the output of that tool as input to this one.

param.name: fieldSelectMode
param.expression: Join All Fields from FFIEC Layer | Manually Select Fields
param.dialogReference:
Specify the mode by which you want to join the tracts attributes to the customer points. There are two options.

  • Join All Fields from the FFIEC Layer - this option will join all available fields in the input tracts layer to the customer points.

  • Manually Select Fields - this option will allow you to select specific fields from the tracts layer to join to the customer points.

param.name: manualSelect
param.dialogReference: This parameter is only available when the Field Selection Mode parameter is set to "Manually Select Fields". Use this parameter to select the individual fields you wish to join from the tracts layer to the customer layer.

param.name: resultLayer
param.dialogReference: Specify the output location of the result layer.

tool.summary: Associates FFIEC attributes to a customer dataset
tool.usage: Use this tool to enrich an existing geocoded customer dataset with variables from the FFIEC. This tool is intended to be used the output of the Build FFIEC Feature Class tool. It accomplishes the join using the spatial relationship between the individual customer points and the census tract that it intersects.

idCitation.resTitle: Enrich Customer Portfolio with FFIEC Data
